refbody.section: PurposeWrite to the output stream of the command line.

dlentry.dd: Text to be written to the stream of the command line. It is displayed only in the command line instance from which this command was issued.

refbody.section: ExampleUse echo command to prepare output of the datetime get display. echo Current time is: ; datetime get Current time is: GMT: 2012-03-22T15:32:06Z Local: Mar 22, 2012 3:32:06 PM
